Ever needed to get to the MyTGS Senior School homepage, but for some reason you have landed on the Junior School page instead? 
Now, with the help of this handy extension, this problem is no more! Bask in the glory of landing on the Senior School page, every time. 



We are in no way affiliated with MyTGS, or TGS in general.
